Text.Page:
Many of our colleagues died during Thulsa's raid, and there was not enough time to take the bodies of the dead with us. The only thing I could do was gather the horns of our fallen comrades into graves of horns.

Now I wish to return the horns of my friends to their families. Retrieve the horns from the grave and bring them to me.

Thank you. At last, the horns will return to where they belong.

Kebal, Duka, and all of you...Once we reclaim the holy ground, I will take your horns to the crypts of your families myself. This I swear.
I want to return my friends' horns to their families.
